arts.ttl: Narcis Pelach singles Leeds United star out for praise as pressure grows on Stoke City chief
arts.sum: Narcis Pelach felt the big turning point in Stoke City's home loss to Championship leaders Leeds United came in the second minute. The Potters could have taken an early lead but Lewis Koumas was thwarted by the agility of Illan Meslier .
Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Stoke City and Leeds United.

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke makes key Joel Piroe point as Leeds United ease past Stoke City to reclaim top spot
arts.sum: Leeds United manager Daniel Farke praised his players mentality after their 2-0 triumph at struggling Stoke City. Another clean sheet, win and an important three points on the road against an opponent that wanted to turn their momentum a little bit.

arts.ttl: Leeds United player ratings as Joel Piroe and Daniel James sparkle in Stoke City win
arts.sum: Jayden Bogle had a terrific game and linked up well with Daniel James on the right. Played several balls through to the onrushing Daniel James.

arts.ttl: Stoke player ratings vs Leeds as miserable stadium empties long before full-time
arts.sum: Stoke should have taken the lead in the opening minutes through Lewis Koumas but from that point on, barring a couple of minutes mid-way through the second half, it was heavy one-way traffic and as routine a win for Leeds United as they’ll probably have all season. It was Piroe who put the game to bed just after the hour mark when he was free to tap in a cross from Daniel James and the miserable home fans slowly trudged to the exits; an all-too predictable and depressing match that means Stoke are now nine games without a win.

arts.ttl: Leeds United told £7.5m will seal the deal for midfielder with 23 goals and 10 assists
arts.sum: Leeds United are actively seeking to bolster their squad as the January transfer window approaches. The Yorkshire outfit find themselves in a desirable position, sitting third in the Championship table with a game still to play, just two points behind second-placed Burnley and trailing leaders Sheffield United by three points. With promotion to the Premier […] The post Leeds United told £7.5m will seal the deal for midfielder with 23 goals and 10 assists appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Leeds United team news vs Stoke City as Daniel Farke makes Pascal Struijk decision
arts.sum: Illan Meslier continues his streak of starting every Championship game this season as Jayden Bogle begins at right-back again having scored against Oxford United in Saturday's 4-0 win. The defender was benched for the 4-0 away win at Oxford United last Saturday having been an injury doubt due to a hamstring concern.

arts.ttl: Leeds United show 'serious' transfer interest in Swedish player amid Illan Meslier uncertainty
arts.sum: Leeds United have expressed "serious interest" in Mjallby goalkeeper Noel Tornqvist heading into the January transfer window, according to Swedish outlet FotbollDirekt. “If Leeds get promoted then I think Illan will be offered a new contract and they’ll be in the Premier League, but I cannot see them selling him in the January transfer window.”

arts.ttl: Stoke City vs Leeds United live - Team news from bet365 Stadium - Stoke-on-Trent Live
arts.sum: Hello from the bet365 Stadium as Stoke City take on Leeds United in the Championship. We will have all the news, action and reaction as it happens from the bet365 Stadium.

arts.ttl: Brand new Leeds United reveal is great news for Daniel Farke going into 2025
arts.sum: Revealed: Leeds top majority of Championship stats, not goals conceded though Leeds United are looking to head into 2025 sitting in the top two of the Championship as they do right now, and virtually every major stat has them as the best in the division right now.
